类的使用
org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime.docker.DockerCommand

  • 使用DockerCommand的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime.docker
    Package containing classes related to Docker commands and common operations used within the @{link DockerLinuxContainerRuntime}.

    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager.linux.runtime.docker中DockerCommand的使用

      Encapsulates the docker kill command and its command line arguments.

      Encapsulates the docker pull command and its command line arguments.

      Encapsulates the docker rm command and its command line arguments.

      Encapsulates the docker start command and its command line arguments.

      Encapsulates the docker stop command and its command line arguments.
      class  DockerVolumeCommand
      Docker Volume Command, run "docker volume --help" for more details.
